alert.note: Alert for Gove; Greeley; Logan; Thomas; Wallace; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 10:21PM CDT until June 10 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wichita County in west central Kansas... Southern Wallace County in west central Kansas... South central Thomas County in northwestern Kansas... Logan County in west central Kansas... Greeley County in west central Kansas... Southwestern Gove County in west central Kansas... * Until 1000 PM MDT/1100 PM CDT/. * At 920 PM MDT/1020 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Monument to 9 miles west of Russell Springs to 9 miles south of Weskan, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Mesonet. A automated weather station 10 miles northeast of Wallace reported a 62 mph wind gust. The strongest winds may occur before any rainfall. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Monument around 1025 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Tribune and Horace. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Gove; Greeley; Logan; Thomas; Wallace; Wichita
